title: 'If there is a question, there is an answer.' Is that true? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don’t know. OOHHHHH. THERE IS AN ANSWER TO EVERY QUESTION. Or is “I don’t know” a reply and not an answer. Hmm. Is there a correct answer is more accurate. And Yes. Still yes. Bc even if I don’t know there is STILL AN ANSWER. YES.
